description: Spain's government is to meet in emergency session after the storm carved a swathe of destruction.
title: Storm Gloria: Spain death toll rises to 13 with four missing
title_page: Storm Gloria: Spain death toll rises to 13 with four missing - BBC News
maintext: Spanish media reported four storm-related deaths in Catalonia, five in Valencia and two in Andalusia with one in the central region of Castile and Le¨®n and one in the northern region of Asturias.
